caption.p: Development of the underground parts. Comparisons between the two types of Polygonum multiflorum seedlings [seed seedling (SS) and culture seedling (CS)]. n = 10 samples containing all the underground parts; bar graphs represent each treatment mean ± standard error of the mean (SEM). Unpaired t-test with Welch’s correction was used to determine significant differences between SS and CS ( ns = not significant, * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01).
